reviewText:
This DVD shows you only the basic of Feng Shui. That's the goal of Dummies series. The beautiful video does help you easily understand the basic principles. It will leave you wanting for more. You'll have to read books on this subject to satisfy your need.

It's worth buying.

This dvd gives the basics of what Feng Shui is & interviews with top practicing experts in this field. There is only a few things told about, such as no mirrors in the bedroom, the opposite corner of the door is the command position & best for desks & beds, keep bathroom doors closed, what colors are best to represent diff areas of life which as represented in the house such as marriage, knowledge, wealth, etc. All this you can find on the net with more information. Try your local library.
